## type ClogHandler



```go
type ClogHandler struct {
    St    *Styles
    Level slog.Leveler
    Lvl   int

    Mut *sync.Mutex
    Out io.Writer

    MaxLen int
    // contains filtered or unexported fields
}
```

<a name="Logger"></a>
## type Logger



```go
type Logger interface {
    Error(msg string, args ...any)
    Info(msg string, args ...any)
    Warn(msg string, args ...any)
    Debug(msg string, args ...any)
}
```
